data.title: Intertek PSI Canton, MA
data.meta_description: PSI's Canton office services Norfolk County and it's surrounding markets. The Canton office is one of 72 PSI offices throughout the United States, providing engineering and construction solutions to architects, owners, developers, contractors, and government agencies.
data.text:
PSI's Canton office services Norfolk County and it's surrounding markets. The Canton office is one of 72 PSI offices throughout the United States, providing engineering and construction solutions to architects, owners, developers, contractors, and government agencies.

PSI's services range from geotechnical and advanced geophysical engineering, construction materials testing, environmental consulting, building advisory, and industrial hygiene to specialty testing and engineering, offering services that span the entire construction life cycle with the reliability, efficiency, and convenience of working with one company.

PSI Canton has a staff of engineers and industry professionals who understand the nuances and unique requirements of state and local building codes and testing standards. The Canton team has worked on some of the most iconic building and infrastructure projects in Massachusetts such as: Ted Williams Tunnel-Boston, MA, 111 Huntington Office Building, Boston, MA, Fenway Park Improvements-Boston, MA, Russia Wharf-Boston, MA, Fan Pier-South Boston, MA, Massachusetts Institute of Technology Vassar Street Housing-Cambridge, MA, Moderna Biotechnology Company World Headquarters-Cambridge, MA, Union Square Development Project-Somerville, MA, Allston Labworks-Allston, MA, Boston Arts Academy-Boston and MA.

Contact PSI Canton

PSI Canton Services

Construction Materials Testing & Engineering

The verification of your construction materials on a job site is essential for compliance with the project’s specifications and the local and national building codes and also to ensure the safety and success of the structure being built. We perform more types of materials testing than any other independent commercial laboratory and we can design specialized tests to meet the unique needs of your project. LEARN MORE.

Geotechnical Engineering Services

One of the most fundamental elements of every development project is the need to identify a site's subsurface characteristics and composition of the site's soil and rock. Geotechnical assessments are used to collect and analyze data to better understand subsurface conditions. LEARN MORE.

Subsurface Investigations & Exploration

Foundation Design & Analysis

Environmental Services

Intertek’s environmental and industrial hygiene services provide customers with cost-effective solutions that ensure compliance with regulations and help reduce liabilities. From asbestos surveys to lead-based paint and hazardous materials, soil remediation to site assessments, and more, we have the experience and knowledge you require. LEARN MORE.
